attributes.text:
@notice Returns number of distribution pools, access: ANY
 @return _distributionPoolsCount is total number of distribution pools

@notice Removes distribution by passed id, access: DAO
 @param _distributionPoolId is id of pool distribution should be removed

params._pool: is address of pool to be added
params._poolStrategy: is pool strategy that pool is assigned to

returns._distributionPoolId: is total number of distribution pools

params._address: address of account/contract to return balance of

returns._tokensAmount: is number of tokens stored in Pool

params._tokensAmount: number of tokens that should be added to Pool

params._address: address of account/contract that is willing to put tokens to Pool
params._tokensAmount: number of tokens that should be added to Pool

params._distributionPoolId: is id of distribution to return

params._limit: is number of distribution pools to returns from _offset
params._offset: is starting item in array to return array from

returns._distributionPoolsCount: is total number of distribution pools
is total number of distribution pools

params._tokensAmount: number of tokens that should be release from Pool

params._address: address of account/contract that Pool has to transfer tokens to
params._tokensAmount: number of tokens that should be release from Pool

params._distributionPoolId: is id of pool distribution should be removed

returns._token: address of token this pool created for

params._distributionPoolId: is id of pool distribution should be updated
params._pool: is address of pool to change to
params._poolStrategy: is pool strategy address to change to

addDistributionPool(address,address).notice: Adds distribution to pass captured tokens to, gateway can have multiple records of same pool with different pool strategies, access: DAO

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns tokens balance of passed address in Pool, access: ANY

capture(uint256).notice: Store tokens to pool, access: ANY

captureFor(address,uint256).notice: Store tokens to pool and assign it to passed address, access: ANY

distributionPool(uint256).notice: Returns list of distribution pools, access: ANY

distributionPools(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns list of distribution pools, access: ANY

distributionPoolsCount().notice: Returns number of distribution pools, access: ANY

release(uint256).notice: Release tokens from pool, access: ANY

releaseFor(address,uint256).notice: Release tokens from pool and transfer them to assigned address, access: ANY

removeDistributionPool(uint256).notice: Removes distribution by passed id, access: DAO

token().notice: Returns token this Pool is operating with access: ANY

updateDistributionPool(uint256,address,a.notice: Updates distribution by passed id, access: DAO
